data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Suðurland, Iceland need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Suðurland, Iceland
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Suðurland with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Suðurland, Iceland to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Suðurland. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Thai, Isan people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,293 believers in Suðurland.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Suðurland
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Suðurland that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
